item.title: By: Open Hardware Summit 2012 | Digital News
item.dc:creator: Open Hardware Summit 2012 | Digital News
item.description: [...] And now, we have good news and bad news. Which do you want first? Good news? Ok: The summit has sold out! People are pumped about open source! And now the bad news: The summit has sold out. But there is still hope! Tickets are still available as part of the Supporter-level sponsorship package, so if you or your company want to support the summit and head to New York, check out their options here! [...]
item.content:encoded: […] And now, we have good news and bad news. Which do you want first? Good news? Ok: The summit has sold out! People are pumped about open source! And now the bad news: The summit has sold out. But there is still hope! Tickets are still available as part of the Supporter-level sponsorship package, so if you or your company want to support the summit and head to New York, check out their options here! […]

item.title: By: Help The Open Source Hardware Summit!
item.dc:creator: Help The Open Source Hardware Summit!
item.description: [...] The Open Hardware Summit still needs some sponsor support. ANYONE can sponsor the Summit and every bit counts – and there are some pretty great benefits you’ll see when you click through the link. If you enjoy the wonderful world of open source software and hardware PLEASE considering supporting the Summit! [...]

item.title: By: High Technology » Blog Archive » Open Hardware Summit – Call for Sponsors
item.dc:creator: High Technology » Blog Archive » Open Hardware Summit – Call for Sponsors
item.description: [...] Open Hardware Summit – Call for Sponsors. The Open Hardware Summit is made possible through the generosity of sponsors — individuals, hackerspaces, businesses large and small — who recognize the importance of an ongoing conversation about the Open Hardware Movement. Your donations allow us to keep ticket prices low, and help ensure that the summit remains accessible to all open hardware enthusiasts. [...]
